page.title: 04RELIGION.
page.content: There are three centres for worship in this area_the church at Cwm(ref066775) the chapel at Marian Cwm(ref075777) and the chapel at Rhuallt(ref075751). The former represents the Church in Wales,the other two being Methodist chapels. A further chapel,again Methodist, once operated just to the north of Waen Gate,to the west of the village of Rhuallt(ref.059750),but has ceased to function in that capacity and now serves as a community meeting centre. This,despite its comparatively small size.
